title: If We Ever Tell
description: The life of thirteen-year-old Jane has changed, but not for the better. From an unloved child of a bitter single mother to a victim of sexual abuse at the hand of her stepfather, she conceals her suffering from the rest of the world.Until her two closest friends stumble on her secret.Jane pleads with them to be loyal and tell no one. Because if they ever tell, the monster at home would plant a bullet between her eyes as he promised.But when her secret-keepers are split on the relationship between friendship and loyalty, the safety of her secret is threatened.
author: Obed Armah
